task.title: Manage Studio Permissions for Users
task.shortdesc: Change the permission of various levels of users, including administrators, moderators, and site visitors.

context.p: Studio Administrators and Studio Managers can view and edit another Studio User’s Assigned Roles.
User Managers can view and manage end user (site visitor) accounts.

step.cmd: Click the Studio Access tab to view and manage the User’s Studio permissions.
Select or deselect the listed options to change the Assigned Roles.
